quote: You have to communicate. It's, I can't even tell you how important that is.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the critical importance of communication in real estate transactions.
suggested_hook: Struggling with closing deals? Here's why communication is your secret weapon.

quote: Open houses are a great opportunity to meet potential buyers and sellers.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the misconception that open houses are outdated.
suggested_hook: Think open houses are a waste of time? Think again!
